message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $10,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your budget,  $7,500 is quite a bit lower than I had in mind. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $9,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $8,200. Can you consider that?
